ValidationRule.description: Ensure Status Update field is populated before progressing opportunity from "Qualify" to "Propose" stage and beyond.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), ISCHANGED( StageName ), ISBLANK( Monthly_Executive_Summary__c ), OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Propose"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Negotiate"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Status Update. Status Update must be populated with a summary of the current position of the Opportunity
